Determining undefined slope from a table

Determining Slope \begin{tabular}{|c|c|}\n\hline[imath] x [/imath] & [imath] y [/imath] \\\n\hline 3 & -1000 \\\n\hline 3 & 0 \\\n\hline 3 & 1000 \\\n\hline 3 & 2000 \\\n\hline 3 & 3000 \\\n\hline 3 & 4000 \\\n\hline 3 & 5000 \\\n\hline\n\end{tabular}
